reviewtext: I use this when I travel up north on I95. I hooked it up with a portable outside antenna and it worked great. I would suggest this setup for anyone that uses it traveling. You would need to buy an adaptor piece (Cobra HA-BNC BNC to Standard Connector for Hand-Held CB Antennas)  that fits the antenna to the top of the scanner. I use the Little Wil antenna with this and it works terrific.
